overview: The English poet and playwright William Shakespeare said: "All the world's a stage. And all the men and women merely players.» After observing, I can say that the whole world is a cellar and people are icicles in it. A few more moments and we will disappear - melt. Or maybe it's not about how much we have left? It is only necessary not to miss an important point. The film is a poetic film, a kaleidoscopic fairy tale journey to an old cellar, in which one winter morning, for strange reasons, the walls from the inside were covered with a thick layer of icicles.
title: Cellar
